snippet: Philando Castile’s family recalled in detail his final hours before a fatal police stop in Minnesota. The official version of what happened remains largely opaque....
abstract: Family of Philando Castile, black man whose fatal shooting by Falcon Heights, Minn, Police Officer Jeronimo Yanez during traffic stop was streamed live on Facebook, calls for special prosecutor to take over investigation into killing; asks Justice Dept to consider opening its own investigation.

byline.contributor: Matt Furber contributed reporting from St. Paul, and Robert Gebeloff from New York.

lead_paragraph: Philando Castile’s family recalled in detail his final hours before a fatal police stop in Minnesota. The official version of what happened remains largely opaque.

headline.main: Philando Castile’s Last Night: Tacos and Laughs, Then a Drive
headline.print_headline: Family of Minnesota Man Killed by Police Calls for Inquiry by a Special Prosecutor
